comment:
6 Year
62% Alc/ Vol
Barrel 2064
21C
Private Selection
Nose: cinnamon, but overall all else was light on the nose, nothing jumping out
The proof fills your mouth in a pleasant way
The finish more cinnamon, lingering 
It was okay...hoped for more complexity, more of the fruitiness, and or sweetness, more caramel, more oak...Did not poses what I really enjoy in a whiskey
